refentryinfo.title: Easier way how to handle version formats

refnamediv.refpurpose: Easier way how to handle version formats using git describe version formats

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Version strings based on git tags and building date strings are exported to building shell: APP_FULL_VERSION_TAG, APP_SHORT_VERSION_TAG, APP_BUILD_DATE, APP_FULL_VERSION_AND_DATE

refsect1.title: EXAMPLES
refsect1.para:
shell usage
$ appver APP_FULL_VERSION_TAG=1.0.1 APP_SHORT_VERSION_TAG=1.0.1 APP_BUILD_DATE=20140203_1618
